DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety Etanercept patient spondylarthropathy refractory heel enthesitis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Etanercept Treatment Refractory Heel Enthesitis Spondylarthropathy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Spondylarthropathy Heel enthesitis refractory standard treatment Between 18 70 year age The patient global assessment disease activity ( measure 100 mm VAS ) must > 40 last 48 hour Exclusion criterion Use > 1 local steroid injection within 2 week screen Prior exposure TNFinhibitor , include etanercept Dose NSAIDs change within two week study drug evaluation
